PAD.synopsis: Player investigates an old resupply spot for a drow patrol - Lolth-sworn no less. Drow characters may have some extra reactivity here.

PAD_0.speaker: Player
PAD_0.text: Lolth's sigils on every box. If this place wasn't already abandoned, I'd set it ablaze.

PAD_1.speaker: Player
PAD_1.text: Bunch of empty boxes and spiderwebs. Guess Lolth's cultists haven't been back here in a while.
